ProductUsageResourcePolicy.name: ProductUsageResourcePolicy
ProductUsageResourcePolicy.description: Represents the policies applicable to the usage resource when itâ€™s associated with a sellable product. These policies are derived from the parent usage resource and can be overridden when setting up usage modeling.
